name.description: For example, name of the parameter that caused the error

type.description: URL of the error type. Can be used to lookup the error in a documentation

message.example: Actualiza el precio del Pollo con papas fritas a $7.500

info.title: OpenAPI

- `micartapro/app/adapter/in/fuegoapi/apimiddleware.NewJWTAuthMiddleware.func1`

post.description:

- `micartapro/app/adapter/in/fuegoapi/apimiddleware.NewJWTAuthMiddleware.func1`

---

Sets the active (OPEN) journey to CLOSED and sets closed_at. Returns 404 if there is no open journey for this menu.
